question: Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: She had to ______ her presentation because she was feeling ill. (postpone)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: The team needs to ______ the new project before the deadline. (complete)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: I'll ______ that issue during the meeting tomorrow. (discuss)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: She always ______ to the challenges at work. (manages well)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: We need to ______ our expenses to stay within budget. (reduce)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: The company decided to ______ the new product line due to poor sales. (discontinue)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: I can't ______ what she said because of the noise. (hear clearly)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: The police are ______ the missing person's case. (investigating)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: You need to ______ your work before submitting it. (review and correct)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: After the divorce, she had to ______ from the emotional trauma. (recover)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: The manager had to ______ a difficult employee. (reprimand)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: I ______ my old friend at the supermarket yesterday. (met unexpectedly)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: We need to ______ more staff to handle the increased workload. (employ)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: The concert was ______ due to bad weather. (canceled)
Complete the sentence with the correct phrasal verb: The marketing team is ______ a new advertising campaign. (creating)
